overview: Small step back: this summer, after a little initiation to ride in high mountains, Mister Freeride asked me to take him on BIG! He wanted adrenaline. So departure in the middle of the night for this immense face of more than 1000 m, extremely steep, with a complex route, totally freeride and isolated.  And ... as we approached the top, we quickly understood that we are going to have a lot more adrenaline than expected!
title: Sur Vivre
